name: Updater
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
CopyJob
Updater
description: Yielded to a block to accumulate changes for an API request.

methods.name: location=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
CopyJob
Updater#location=
methods.description: Sets the geographic location where the job should run. Required except for US and EU.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"
table = dataset.table "my_table"
destination_table = dataset.table "my_destination_table"

copy_job = table.copy_job destination_table do |j|
  j.location = "EU"
end

copy_job.wait_until_done!
copy_job.done? #=> true

params.name: value
params.description:
A geographic location, such as “US”, “EU” or
“asia-northeast1”. Required except for US and EU.

methods.name: create=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
CopyJob
Updater#create=
methods.description:
Sets the create disposition.

This specifies whether the job is allowed to create new tables. The default value is needed.

The following values are supported:

  • needed - Create the table if it does not exist.
  • never - The table must already exist. A ‘notFound’ error is raised if the table does not exist.

methods.name: write=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
CopyJob
Updater#write=
methods.description:
Sets the write disposition.

This specifies how to handle data already present in the table. The default value is append.

The following values are supported:

  • truncate - BigQuery overwrites the table data.
  • append - BigQuery appends the data to the table.
  • empty - An error will be returned if the table already contains data.

methods.name: encryption=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
CopyJob
Updater#encryption=
methods.description: Sets the encryption configuration of the destination table.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"
table = dataset.table "my_table"

key_name = "projects/a/locations/b/keyRings/c/cryptoKeys/d"
encrypt_config = bigquery.encryption kms_key: key_name
job = table.copy_job "my_dataset.new_table" do |job|
  job.encryption = encrypt_config
end

params.name: val
params.description: Custom encryption configuration (e.g., Cloud KMS keys).

methods.name: labels=
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
CopyJob
Updater#labels=
methods.description: Sets the labels to use for the job.

params.name: value
params.description:
A hash of user-provided labels associated with
the job. You can use these to organize and group your jobs. Label
keys and values can be no longer than 63 characters, can only
contain lowercase letters, numeric characters, underscores and
dashes. International characters are allowed. Label values are
optional. Label keys must start with a letter and each label in
the list must have a different key.
